org.atteo.moonshine.services

Interface Services

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServicesImplementation

    public interface Services
extends AutoCloseable
    Configures and starts services.

    Each service should implement Service. This interface defines configure() method which allows to register Guice Module, start() and stop() methods to execute some logic upon start and stop of the application.
